original_title: WWE The Beast in the East
overview: The Beast in the East is a professional wrestling event produced by WWE. It took place on July 4, 2015 at Ry≈çgoku Kokugikan in Sumida, Tokyo, Japan. It aired live on the WWE Network and live on J Sports in Japan. Additionally, it's available on demand on both the WWE Network and J Sports. It was the first WWE event to be broadcast live from Japan.
title: WWE The Beast in the East
